page.title: 06 Church Exchange.
page.content:
{Prestbury-Albi(France)Exchange. }
The Albi exchange started like this. Our Vicar went to a meeting with Father Icher,a French Priest who asked if anyone wanted to do an exchange.The Vicar said that,we would like to do it.The Albi exchange started 12years ago.Albi is in the South of France,60km from Toulouse.This year is the 12th exchange.Every year about 45 children go,aged between 13 and 20.One child to each family.When the children go to Albi,they visit places.They visit villages,they do concerts,look round Albi cathedral,and lots of things like that.When the French children come to Prestbury they do similar things.They visit Alton Towers,York and Chester,and they do a concert.
